message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even exceeding the asking price.  What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $12,000 is quite a bit below its true value.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $13,000?
I understand your concerns about the value of the product, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for it. Can you consider this offer?
